lexUnit.name: maim.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: wound or injure (someone) so that part of the body is permanently damaged.

sentence.text: INDIA has long had terrorists who kill and maim to secure secession for various of its 25 states .
He has valued the sexual instinct more than action , while others kill and maim to allow his debased relationship to continue .
